item.title: Book eBPF: Programmatically Extend the Linux Kernel
item.description: ðŸš€ Just finished reading my autographed copy of â€œeBPF: Programmatically Extend the Linux Kernel" and I’m absolutely blown away by the possibilities it offers! If you’re working with Linux, containers, observability or security, this book is a must-read. eBPF allows you to run sandboxed programs in the Linux kernel without changing kernel source code or loading kernel modules.
